title: BTS Series - The Magicians
body:
Shipping

I’ve got a good chunk of the plot typed out and what order I want the first handful of chapters to be written in. From the looks of things (which I have such mixed guilty feelings about) I’m thinking in the end, this is going to be a jungkook x reader ship fic.

It makes me grumpy because I don’t want my Jungkook Trash self influencing this fic but at the same time, it’s obvious that Jungkook plays a huge role in the Fake Love music video. It’s definitely going to be a slow burn ship. Because the reader spends plenty of time with the other boys. Plenty. In fact……Jungkook doesn’t even get to give the reader her first kiss.

But as the reader and Jungkook start working together to solve this mystery, they naturally grow closer and closer. The reader is bound and determined to help Jungkook figure out the mystery behind his key and try to find the door that it unlocks.

So I’ve decided that yes, it’s going to be a Jungkook x reader ship based fic.
